Room.Name: Gold and Ruby Room
Room.LongDescription: You are in a spherical gold room, with rings of red rubys around you. It looks as though you are inside a great golden ball, at the exact center. You appear to be floating in a red mist while an old man's face watches you you from near a circular door which probably goes to the training room. The face smiles, and a hand appears in the mist, holding a small key. You probably ought to ask him what he would like for the key.
